registration.emailUnmatch: Your email addresses do not match.

betting.orderExplanation: The games are ordered by time they take place.
betting.noBetsOfUser: Bets of {{user.first_name}} {{user.last_name}} on games that have been kicked-off will be shown here.
betting.betForChampDescr: Bet now for the champion of the Euro until the first game of the final stage on {{deadline}} and win 10 points.

err.noFixtures: Eww! We cannot retrieve any fixtures at this time. Please, check back later.
err.generalError: Oh man! Something went wrong, we don’t know. Please, check back later.

payment.description: The participation fee amounts to €{{fee}}. The money will be used to award the three top-placed winners of the betting game who will then buy us a round of beer. So, ultimately the money will be invested in beer. The final money prizes will be announced once the tournament has started. There are three ways to settle up.
payment.preferred: This is the preferred payment method.
payment.transactionDescr: To pay with a bank transaction, you need to mail me and I will reply with my bank details.
